sentence: my name is Selome, do you know anything about Eritrea?

I was a student activist – the government in Eritrea made life hard for us, I couldn’t get a job and my future was looking sad. But it’s not so easy here too.
I need to decide whether to stay in Sudan or move northwards to North Africa or Europe that’s the route many of my people go. What do you think?
